features.featureTitle: Update the Dashboard "Create Lease Listing" / "Edit Lease Listing" dialog (frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseOfferEditorDialog.tsx) so the only user-input required fields are: Listing ID, Lease Code (UUID string), and Split Ratio (NLO/ULO, e.g., 60/40). Remove Location, Area, and Capacity from the required validation and from the primary form UI (they may be omitted entirely or moved into an optional/advanced section that is not required to submit).

Ensure the dashboard create/update listing mutations still send valid values to the existing backend API even when Location/Area/Capacity are not entered by the user, by automatically supplying safe defaults in the dialog submit handler (e.g., Location="Unspecified", Area=0, Capacity=0) while preserving the user-entered Listing ID, Lease Code, and Split Ratio.
